description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: Basic is used for handling concepts not yet defined in FHIR, narrative-only resources that don't map to an existing resource, and custom resources not appropriate for inclusion in the FHIR specification.

identifier.description: Identifier assigned to the resource for business purposes, outside the context of FHIR.

code.description: Identifies the 'type' of resource - equivalent to the resource name for other resources.

subject.description: Identifies the patient, practitioner, device or any other resource that is the "focus" of this resource.

created.description: Identifies when the resource was first created.

author.description: Indicates who was responsible for creating the resource instance.
